       <div id="wrapbox21452305">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21452305">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21452305">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Resources for Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21452305">
          <div id="boxatt21452305" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24948858">
              <a id="link_24948858" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948858,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948859">
              <a id="link_24948859" href="http://www.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948859,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948859}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21452306">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21452306">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21452306">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Resources for Books and Articles (General and Local)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21452306">
          <p>
           Check the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=356743">
            Subject Guides
           </a>
           (linked from the Library Homepage in the Research area) for other recommended databases for this and related subject areas.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21452306" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24948847">
              <b>
               The Lehigh Water Gap: A Documentary History
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               On reserve for this class; Ask at the Lending Services Desk
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948855">
              <a id="link_24948855" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948855,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948848">
              <a id="link_24948848" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ahl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948848,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12706311}); ">
               America: History and Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journal articles, books, book chapter, book reviews, dissertations, and more in U.S. and Canadian history.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24950679">
              <a id="link_24950679" href="http://digital.lib.lehigh.edu/beyondsteel/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24950679,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24950679}); ">
               Beyond Steel: An Archive of Lehigh Valley Industry and Culture (Lehigh University)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "highlights the Lehigh Valley's mid nineteenth-century boom, late twentieth-century decline and continuing community readjustment"
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948854">
              <a id="link_24948854" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948854,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948854}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search through a massive collection of books, as well as scholarly journals, newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948861">
              <a id="link_24948861" href="http://www.google.com/books" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948861,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12378397}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search for books indexed and scanned by the Google books project.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948852">
              <a id="link_24948852" href="https://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948852,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948852}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search scholarly books, book chapters, and journal articles via Google. Some full text may be available online for free or you may be connected to the library's online subscriptions directly; otherwise, search Encompass Search by book title or journal title to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21452307">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21452307">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21452307">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Resources for Maps
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21452307">
          <div id="boxatt21452307" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24948872">
              <b>
               The Atlas of Pennsylvania
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Atlas case 19
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24950680">
              <a id="link_24950680" href="http://digital.lib.lehigh.edu/beyondsteel/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24950680,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24950679}); ">
               Beyond Steel: An Archive of Lehigh Valley Industry and Culture (Lehigh University)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "highlights the Lehigh Valley's mid nineteenth-century boom, late twentieth-century decline and continuing community readjustment"
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948891">
              <a id="link_24948891" href="http://www.davidrumsey.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948891,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948891}); ">
               David Rumsey Map Collection
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "The historical map collection has over 63,000 maps and images online. The collection includes rare 16th through 21st century maps of America, North America, South America, Europe, Asia, Africa, Pacific and the World."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948874">
              <a id="link_24948874" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948874,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948854}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search for atlases and maps in our library's collection
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24950693">
              <a id="link_24950693" href="http://collection1.libraries.psu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/pageol/id/43550" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24950693,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24950693}); ">
               Geologic Map of Carbon County (Penn State)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948881">
              <a id="link_24948881" href="http://digital.lib.lehigh.edu/lvgeology/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948881,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948881}); ">
               Geology of Lehigh and Northampton Counties, Pennsylvania: Historical Works
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "These two volumes from the Pennsylvania Geological Survey fourth series provide a wealth of detail about Lehigh and Northampton Counties, including their geography, geology, meteorology, and history."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948893">
              <a id="link_24948893" href="http://www.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948893,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948859}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search the web for specific maps that suit your needs.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948879">
              <a id="link_24948879" href="http://www.dot.state.pa.us/Internet/Bureaus/pdPlanRes.nsf/infoBPRHistoricCountyMaps" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948879,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948879}); ">
               Historic County Maps
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               From the Pennsylvania Department of Transportation
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948864">
              <a id="link_24948864" href="https://www.loc.gov/maps/collections/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948864,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948864}); ">
               Library of Congress Map Collections
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "The focus of
               <i>
                Map Collections
               </i>
               is Americana and Cartographic Treasures of the Library of Congress. These images were created from maps and atlases and, in general, are restricted to items that are not covered by copyright protection."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948885">
              <a id="link_24948885" href="https://secureapps.libraries.psu.edu/content/pageo.cfm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948885,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948885}); ">
               Pennsylvania Geology (Penn State)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "This collection contains materials relating to the geology and water resources of Pennsylvania as published by the PA" Geological Survey, U.S. Geological Survey, and others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24950691">
              <a id="link_24950691" href="http://www.portal.state.pa.us/portal/server.pt/community/land_records/3184/maps/535033" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24950691,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24950691}); ">
               Pennsylvania Historical and Museum Commission: Maps
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948867">
              <a id="link_24948867" href="http://www.lib.utexas.edu/maps/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948867,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948867}); ">
               Perry-Castaneda Library Map Collection (University of Texas)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Varied collection of current and historical maps.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24948886">
              <a id="link_24948886" href="http://www.usgs.gov/pubprod/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24948886,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Historical Ecology of the Lehigh Valley', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24948886}); ">
               US Geological Survey: Maps
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5696306" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>

       <div id="wrapbox21452289">

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>

           </em>

           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
